QuestData.Title: Instant Messaging
QuestData.Description: Welcome, wikket! Me Kah Kah - chief of Grookin Hill hozen.$b$bDook Ookem wanted to be chief, but good wikket grook him good - big gift to Kah Kah.$b$bHozen has gift for good wikket too. Gift come from great crash. Hozen keep it safe for wikket.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Hellscream's Fist Signal Flare near Chief Kah Kah at Grookin Hill.
